channel.title: Using Items on other items
channel.description: I know this is probably an easy question to answer and i could probably figure this out on my own if i kept trying but if someone could just post how the coding looks for using one item on another item to get a third item (example ring + diamond = diamond ring) I'd be very thankful. After all it is thanksgiving, i do need something to be thankful for

item.title: Using Items on other items
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if ((itemUsed == 1635) && (useWith == 1601) || (itemUsed == 1601) && (useWith == 1635)) {
    c.getItems().addItem(1643, 1);
    c.sendMessage("You combine the diamond and the gold ring to form a diamond ring.");
}

Here is exactly what you asked for.
Now you should get the drift of how its used.

Read full topic

item.title: Using Items on other items
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

                if (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####) || (itemUsed == #### && useWith == ####) { //Same numbers in box1 and 4 and 2 and 3
                        if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(####, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(####, 1)) {
                                        c.getItems().deleteItem(####, c.getItems().getItemSlot(####),1);
                                        c.getItems().deleteItem(####, c.getItems().getItemSlot(####),1);
                                        c.getItems().addItem(####,1);
                                        c.sendMessage("SENDED MESSAGE HERE");
                                        c.getPA().addSkillXP(300 * Config.SKILLNAME_EXPERIENCE, c.playerSkill);
                        } else {
                                c.sendMessage("send error message here");
                        }
                }

try that, Just modified an earlier tried code.

Read full topic

item.title: Using Items on other items
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12

@Carnifex12 wrote:

It just gives me 100 errors when i put this in. Do you have anything a little more simple? like something that doesn’t involve skills and experience?

Read full topic

item.title: Using Items on other items
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

if (itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 2436) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(2436, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(261, 1)) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerHerblore] >= 80) { c.getItems().deleteItem(261, c.getItems().getItemSlot(261),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(2436, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2436),1); c.getItems().addItem(15308,1); c.sendMessage("You make an Extreme Attack (4)."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(300 * Config.HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE, c.playerHerblore); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a herblore level of 80 to make an Extreme."); } } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Super Attack (4) and Clean Avantoe for this potion."); } }
Hope it helps.

Read full topic
